dcterms:description: Complete EHR records for all major inpatient surgeries occurring at three hospitals between 2014 and 2019, consisting of demographic and admission information, intraoperative time series data, clinical notes, and binary labels for postoperative complications.
dcterms:title: EHR records for major inpatient surgeries

dcterms:description: Clinical notes for encounters, including History and Physical (H&P notes) and operative reports, used to provide context to structured EHR data.
dcterms:title: Clinical notes for encounters

dcterms:description: Intraoperative time series data consisting of vital signs such as blood pressure, heart rate, and body temperature recorded during surgeries.
dcterms:title: Intraoperative time series data

dcterms:description: Demographic and admission information for patients, including age, sex, body mass index, and other relevant data.
dcterms:title: Demographic and admission information

dcterms:description: Nine binary labels indicating the occurrence of postoperative complications following major inpatient surgery.
dcterms:title: 9 binary labels indicating postoperative complications
